description:
Alan is an airplane mechanic and his job has taken him all over the world. He's pretty modest about it, though.
"Yeah, I've been to a few places," he said.
His favorite?
"Amsterdam," he said with a big smile. "Definitely Amsterdam."
I wonder why!
Alan is straight and he says he enjoys meeting women from all over the world.
"So many different types of women," he said. "It's incredible."
When I was talking with him, a completely off-the-wall question came to mind:
"So, when you're working on a plane, and there are people inside, do girls flirt with you through the window?"
I half expected him to give me a funny look, but instead he laughed like he knew exactly what I was talking about!
"Yeah," he said. "Actually it happens quite a bit."
So the next time you're sitting on a plane, and you look out and see one of those hot guys in the work suit jumpers, you'll know!
title: Alan
